name: Sentinel's Valley
description:
Game Description

You play as a benevolent god who must lead his armies of believers across many battles against their oppressors.

To lead his troops to victory, this benevolent god has the power to shape the battlefield by using a wide range of magic spells to provide an advantageous position to his allies or to put the enemies at disadvantage.

How to Play

Sentinel’s Valley is a 2D puzzle game for mobiles in isometric view.

At the start of each level, the player is given a set number of spells and units to place while the enemy units are already set on the field. Once the player has placed all their units on the field and used all of their spells, they can validate their actions and the rest of the fight will be automated with units from both sides moving and attacking each other until only one side is left.

Controls

Mobile Phone touchscreen
